name: BBEdit Project File
summary: Learn about .BBPROJECT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The BBPROJECT file format is an older format for BBEdit projects. The software now uses the .BBPROJECTD (BBEdit Project Document) format for projects.

description: Project file created by BBEdit, a source code text editor for Mac; saved in an XML format and contains references to files included in the project; allows developers to group and organize source code for software projects.
